parameters.name: FlangeEdge
parameters.description: Edge to which to apply flange

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: True reverses the offset direction of the flange, false does not

title: IModelDoc2.IInsertSketchForEdgeFlange
description: Inserts a sketch for IFeatureManager::InsertSheetMetalEdgeFlange2 in this sheet metal part.
signature:
Feature IInsertSketchForEdgeFlange( 
   Edge
FlangeEdge
,
   System.Double
DAngle
,
   System.Boolean
FlipDir
)

parameters.name: FlangeEdge
parameters.description: Edge to which to apply flange

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: True reverses the offset direction of the flange, false does not

returns: Sketch for the edge flagne, returned as a feature
remarks:
After calling this method, you must create the profile for the flange on the appropriate plane. After creating the profile, call
IFeatureManager::InsertSheetMetalEdgeFlange2
to create the flange.
